title: Good news! World Bank raises India’s GDP growth forecast to 7% for FY25
description: The World Bank has raised its forecast for India's economic growth this fiscal year to 7%, up from 6.6%. India continues to lead as the fastest-growing major economy.

title: Economic growth likely to pick up on festive, rural demand: RBI
description: MUMBAI: India's economic growth is likely to improve in the second half of the current fiscal, driven by festive activity and an upswing in rural demand , RBI's state of the economy report said. It also expects a moderation in the prices of food items, including rice, pulses, and vegetables."Going f...

title: Chad criticized for failure to address herder-farmer clashes amid climate crisis
description:
Amnesty International on Thursday denounced Chad authorities for their failure to protect victims of armed clashes between herders and farmers.
